HediffDef.label: Zeta Reticulan
HediffDef.description:
Cold and mechanical Zeta Reticulans are unaffected by most human emotions. Their frustrations mostly stem from whether work standards are being kept and mission guidelines followed; Their greatest joy is working in their field of expertise. <color=#aeaeae>\n<size=16>Zetas Reticulan highlights:</size><size=12> +PainShockThreshold 18.75% higher than Humans +baseHungerRate 60% lower than Human |PsychicSensitivity 20% higher than Human |Comfortable temperature range: -5c, 10c |baseBodySize 24% lower than Human -baseHealthScale 24% lower than Human -ImmunityGainSpeed 15% slower than Human -Eating Speed 40% slower than Human -Move 13.04% slower than Human
+Construction success chance 20% higher than Human +Construction speed 20% slower than Human -Mining speed 40% slower than Human -PlantWorkSpeed 20% slower than Human
+GlobalLearningFactor 50% higher than Human +Research Speed 50% higher than Human +MedicalTendQuality 20% higher than Human +MedicalSurgerySuccessChance 20% higher than Human
-TameAnimalChance 60% lower than Humans -TrainAnimalChance 60% lower than Humans</size></color>

HediffDef.label: Mantis Hybrid
HediffDef.description:
An extremely aggressive species "Mantis" show little hestation in using violent resolution and pain based coercion methods; a common trait among high-order insectoid races.
Above average ground speed helps the species close distance, while natural scythe like appendages help rend their targets. While their physiology is well suited to combat they're unique psyhsology leaves i'll suited to certain tasks, like mining.
Mantis hybrids are well suited to excursional rolls -having a large tempture range compared to standardize Zeta Reticulans and most other hybridized Reticulans sub-strains- although increased losses among bio-assets should be expected if relegated to direct procurement and specimen handling tasks.
<color=#aeaeae>
<size=16>Mantis Hybrid highlights:</size> 
+Comfortable temperature range: -10c, +21c 
+Move 16.25% faster than base Zetas/1.08% faster than Humans 
Melee accuracy 15% higher than base Zetas/Humans. 
Shooting accuracy 12.5% higher than base Zetas/Humans.

Construction success chance 18.75% lower than base Zeta/2.5% lower than Humans 
Construction speed 3.12% slower than base Zeta/2.5% slower than Humans

Mining speed 20.83% faster than base Zetas/ 27.5% slower than Humans 
Mining yield than 7.5% lower than base Zetas/Humans.

Drug cooking speed 15.5% lower than base Zetas/Humans. 
15% less flammable than base Zetas/Humans.</color>

(Mods "Mantis race" or "Lighter Than Fast" needed to unlock harvestable claws).

HediffDef.label: Scalemen Hybrid
HediffDef.description:
Using gene packets plucked from pre-hybridized Human populations "Scalemen" gene mixes possess resilient skin and a have preference for warm environment.

<size=16>Gameplay highlights:</size>
Comfortable temperature range: +13c, +28c Rest need drains 15% faster than base Zetas/Humans. Toxic sensitivity 25% higher than base Zetas/Humans.

Hunger rate 50% higher than base Zeta/40% lower than Humans

Natural blunt armour speed 6% higher than base Zetas/Humans. 
Natural sharp than 12% higher than base Zetas/Humans.

HediffDef.label: Forsaken Hybrid
HediffDef.description:
Agile, fast, and extremely long lived Forsaken gene stock have produced promising Hybrids although production numbers are limited due to a shortage of material and their bodies are fragile even when compared to standard Reticulan physiology.

<size=16>Gameplay highlights:</size>
Comfortable temperature range: -10c, +23c 
Move 20% faster than base Zetas/4.34% faster than Humans 
Melee dodge chance 10% higher than base Zetas/Humans.

Hybrid stats are mostly averaged between Zetas and the hybrid's orginal race minus a few balance expections. 
Hybrid skill learning factor and research speed stats are docked below this 50/50 average on normally stated races and set at 1.1 and 1.2 respectively (Rather then a 1.25 average)

HediffDef.label: Human Hybrid
HediffDef.description:
Congesting enormous swaths of space, humans are a highly versatile r-selected lifeform. Their populations show vast divergence in gene expression, guided self-modifcation; and fractured, isolated, social systems ripe for bio-collectiion.

<size=16>Gameplay highlights:</size><size=11> 
Comfortable temperature range: +6c, +18c 
 Hybrid stats are averaged between Zetas and the hybrid's orginal race. 
 Hybrid skill learning factor and research speed stats are docked below this 50/50 average on for stated xeno mixes and set at 1.1 and 1.2 respectively (Rather then a 1.25 average for both).

HediffDef.label: Thrumkin Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Dense muscle steels against damage and helps this Hybrid lift heavier loads than most Zeta. It's silky soft coat may help ingratiate it with other bio-forms. \nComfortable temperature range: +1c, +18c

HediffDef.label: Moyo Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Moyo are a self-designed subclade of humans morphologically adapted to amphibious living and largely residing in submerged arcologies. Moyo hybrids retain the unique blood biotics of their precursors, which can be harvested and synthesized into various chemicals. \nComfortable temperature range: -1c, +14c \n(Mod "Moyo-From the depth" needed to unlock harvestable blood)
